name: Pocket Sprung
desc: The pocket sprung mattress has been manufactured with comfort and support in mind, with its individually pocketed springs designed to contour on an adjustable bed.

name: Memory Foam
desc: The memory mattress combines both reflex foam and memory foam, so providing pressure release and enabling the correct posture to be maintained during sleep.

name: Latex
desc: This latex mattress consists of 60% latex, making it especially durable and breathable. If you prefer a cooler, firmer mattress, this would be a great choice.
